content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
RISK-ON: low volatility 13.4% and breadth 8/8 sectors positive, broad-based bull tape.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Energy & Chemicals (1W: +7.39% | 1M: +14.76%) ABOVE TREND; Holding & Investment (1W: +5.30% | 1M: +17.60%) ABOVE TREND; Construction & REIT (1W: +4.32% | 1M: +5.95%) ABOVE TREND.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Transportation (1W: +1.15% | 1M: +6.60%) ABOVE TREND; Banking & Finance (1W: +2.44% | 1M: +11.92%) ABOVE TREND; Technology & Telecom (1W: +3.51% | 1M: +6.28%) ABOVE TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
GUBRF (1W: +19.38% | 1M: +32.87%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +11.14% | 1M: +27.45%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +30.86%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +9.88% | 1M: +22.15%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
THYAO (1W: +0.77% | 1M: +9.79%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +0.14% | 1M: +5.45%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +0.13% | 1M: +22.74%) ABOVE TREND, ULKER (1W: -0.69% | 1M: +18.05%) CORRECTION, TSKB (1W: -0.98% | 1M: +4.96%) CORRECTION.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
GUBRF (1W: +19.38% | 1M: +32.87%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +11.14% | 1M: +27.45%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +30.86%) ABOVE TREND, TCELL (1W: +9.47% | 1M: +20.10%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banks confirm the rally; AKBNK (1W: +1.73% | 1M: +14.87%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +4.37% | 1M: +11.16%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +11.14% | 1M: +27.45%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: -1.75% | 1M: +5.12%) CORRECTION — stay selective on smaller, correction-prone names.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy industry leadership intact: EREGL (1W: +6.85% | 1M: +15.10%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: +6.02% | 1M: +15.80%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: -7.80% | 1M: +37.33%) CORRECTION — profit-taking evident in high beta names.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Energy remains the primary bull engine: GUBRF (1W: +19.38% | 1M: +32.87%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +30.86%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +9.88% | 1M: +22.15%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +0.13% | 1M: +22.74%) ABOVE TREND — momentum plus commodity support.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Risk‑on stance: overweight Energy & Chemicals, Holding & Investment and selective Retail; trim positions showing short-term corrections (ASELS, YKBNK, MGROS) and keep cash for tactical entries on pullbacks.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
GUBRF (1W: +19.38% | 1M: +32.87%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +10.45% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND, TCELL (1W: +9.47% | 1M: +20.10%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +11.14% | 1M: +27.45%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: -7.80% | 1M: +37.33%) CORRECTION.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Energy & Chemicals, Retail & Food, Holding & Investment — all show strong quants and momentum; monitor for continuation or rotation.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100 for continuation above recent highs and for support at the 20-day MA on pullbacks; catalysts: domestic CPI and central bank commentary, Q4 earnings flow, FX moves and global commodity prices (oil, base metals).

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low volatility, full participation RISK‑ON market led by Energy & Chemicals, holdings and select cyclicals; GUBRF, TRMET and TOASO are primary opportunities while ASELS and some small banks show short-term correction risk. Stay overweight cyclicals but pare exposures on high‑beta corrections and use pullbacks for fresh entries.
